Class.name: Demo.PetUtil
Class.Description: PURPOSE: This ulitity class is used to populate test data for Demo.Pet, Demo.PetShop and Demo.Address

Method.name: DeleteData
Method.Description: This method deletes all data for Demo.Pet, Demo.PetShop, and Demo.Address.
Method.Implementation:
write "Deleting pet data...", ! do ##class(Demo.Pet).%DeleteExtent()
write "Deleting petshop data...", ! do ##class(Demo.PetShop).%DeleteExtent()
write "Deleting address data...", ! do ##class(Demo.Address).%DeleteExtent()
write "Success! All data reset."

Method.name: PopulateData
Method.Description: This method populates test data for Demo.Address, Demo.PetShop, Demo.Pet, and Demo.PetSlow
